changes: Added automatic database cleanup to prevent unbounded growth
Implemented 90-day retention for logs, transmissions, and receptions
Added periodic cleanup task running every 24 hours
Added database vacuuming to reclaim space after cleanup
Added API endpoints for version and changelog
Created helper script for adding changelog entries
Added keyboard commands for TX and RX modes in viewer (r: RX, t: TX, F5: Reload, ESC: Exit)
Replaced Fastext color labels with keyboard command labels for better user guidance
Fixed TX mode hang during page refresh by running update_all() in background thread
Added prime_user_settings() to prevent input prompts during TX mode refresh
Significantly improved UK weather and weather map page load times with caching and parallel fetching
Added 10-minute cache for wttr.in API responses to reduce API calls
Implemented parallel fetching for multiple weather locations simultaneously
